parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: Command
parameters.description: The content of the command. The content must be 2 to 2,048 characters in length.

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: The information of nodes on which the command is run.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description:
The timeout period. If a command times out, the command process will be terminated. Unit: seconds.

Default value: 60.

parameters.name: WorkingDir
parameters.description: The working directory of the command. Default value: `/root`.
